recipes.name: Kabuli Pulao
instructions: Brown lamb pieces with spices
Add water and simmer 45 minutes
Cook rice separately with cardamom
Fry carrots until caramelized
Layer rice with meat and carrots
Garnish with almonds and raisins

recipes.name: Mantu (Afghan Dumplings)
instructions: Mix beef, onion, garlic, coriander, and salt
Fill wonton wrappers, fold and seal
Steam dumplings 30 minutes
Serve with tomato sauce and yogurt sauce

recipes.name: Bolani (Stuffed Flatbread)
instructions: Make dough, roll out flatbreads
Boil and mash potatoes, mix with onion, cilantro, salt
Fill dough, seal, and fry until golden

recipes.name: Aushak (Leek Dumplings)
instructions: Fill wrappers with leeks, steam 30 minutes
Top with beef sauce, yogurt, and mint

recipes.name: Shorwa (Afghan Soup)
instructions: Brown lamb, add vegetables and chickpeas
Add water, simmer 90 minutes, season to taste

recipes.name: Qabili Palau (Afghan Pilaf)
instructions: Brown lamb with spices, simmer until tender
Cook rice, layer with meat, carrots, raisins, and almonds

recipes.name: Korma (Afghan Stew)
instructions: Brown beef with onion and garlic
Add tomato and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Sabzi (Spinach Stew)
instructions: Brown lamb with onion and garlic
Add spinach and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Sheer Korma (Milk Dessert)
instructions: Toast vermicelli in butter
Add milk, sugar, cardamom, simmer until thickened
Stir in raisins and almonds

recipes.name: Firnee (Afghan Pudding)
instructions: Mix milk, sugar, cornstarch, and cardamom, cook until thickened
Pour into bowls, chill, garnish with pistachios

recipes.name: Naan-e-Afghani (Afghan Bread)
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and water, knead dough
Let rise, shape into loaves, sprinkle with sesame, bake

recipes.name: Kofta (Meatballs)
instructions: Mix all ingredients, form meatballs
Brown in pan, simmer in tomato sauce

recipes.name: Banjaan Borani (Eggplant with Yogurt)
instructions: Fry eggplant slices, layer with tomato and onion sauce
Top with yogurt and mint

recipes.name: Shir Berinj (Rice Pudding)
instructions: Cook rice in milk with sugar and cardamom
Add rose water, chill before serving

recipes.name: Lawang (Yogurt Lamb Stew)
instructions: Brown lamb with onion and garlic
Add yogurt and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Aush (Noodle Soup)
instructions: Brown beef with onion and garlic
Add tomato, chickpeas, simmer, add noodles
Top with yogurt and mint

recipes.name: Kichiri Qoroot (Rice and Yogurt)
instructions: Cook rice, top with qoroot sauce and fried onions

recipes.name: Mastawa (Rice Soup)
instructions: Brown lamb with onion, add carrot, chickpeas, rice, and water
Simmer until rice is tender

recipes.name: Kadu Borani (Braised Pumpkin)
instructions: Saut√© pumpkin with onion, garlic, and tomato
Top with yogurt and mint

recipes.name: Shola (Rice and Mung Bean Porridge)
instructions: Cook rice and mung beans with onion, garlic, and spices until creamy

recipes.name: Dopiaza (Onion Lamb Stew)
instructions: Brown lamb with onion and garlic
Add spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Sabzi (Spinach and Lamb Stew)
instructions: Brown lamb with onion and garlic
Add spinach and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Alu Bukhara (Beef and Prune Stew)
instructions: Brown beef with onion and garlic
Add prunes and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Bamia (Okra Stew)
instructions: Brown lamb with onion and garlic
Add okra, tomato, and salt, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Kachaloo (Potato Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add potato, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Baingan (Eggplant Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add eggplant, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Tarkari (Vegetable Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add vegetables and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Gosht (Beef Stew)
instructions: Brown beef with onion and garlic, add spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Kadu (Pumpkin Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add pumpkin, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Murgh (Chicken Stew)
instructions: Brown chicken with onion and garlic, add spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Badenjan (Eggplant and Tomato Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add eggplant, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Gulpea (Cauliflower Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add cauliflower, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Lobia (Bean Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add beans, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Mash (Mung Bean Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add mung beans, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Shalgham (Turnip Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add turnip, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Torai (Zucchini Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add zucchini, tomato, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Palak (Spinach Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add spinach and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Kadu Palak (Pumpkin and Spinach Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add pumpkin, spinach, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Tarkari Palak (Vegetable and Spinach Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add vegetables, spinach, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Tarkari Kadu (Vegetable and Pumpkin Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add vegetables, pumpkin, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Qorma-e-Tarkari Lobia (Vegetable and Bean Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add vegetables, beans, and spices, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Sheer Korma (Afghan Vermicelli Pudding)
instructions: Fry vermicelli in a little oil, add milk and sugar, simmer, add cardamom, raisins, and nuts, cook until thickened.

recipes.name: Shorwa (Afghan Soup)
instructions: Simmer lamb with vegetables, chickpeas, and spices until meat is tender and soup is flavorful.

recipes.name: Kichiri Qoroot (Rice and Yogurt Curd)
instructions: Cook rice and lentils, mix with qoroot and saut√©ed onion, season with salt.

recipes.name: Aushak (Leek Dumplings)
instructions: Prepare dough, fill with leeks, boil dumplings, top with meat sauce, yogurt, and mint.

recipes.name: Sabzi (Afghan Spinach)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add spinach and spices, cook until wilted.

recipes.name: Kabab-e-Murgh (Chicken Kebab)
instructions: Marinate chicken, skewer, grill until cooked through.

recipes.name: Kabab-e-Gosfand (Lamb Kebab)
instructions: Marinate lamb, skewer, grill until cooked through.

recipes.name: Kabab-e-Chopan (Shepherd's Kebab)
instructions: Rub lamb ribs with spices, skewer, grill over open flame until charred and cooked.

recipes.name: Kabab-e-Degi (Pot Kebab)
instructions: Layer beef and vegetables in a pot with spices, cook slowly until tender.

recipes.name: Kabab-e-Farshi (Pan Kebab)
instructions: Mix beef with spices and vegetables, form into patties, pan-fry until cooked through.

recipes.name: Kofta Challow (Afghan Meatballs with Rice)
instructions: Mix beef, onion, garlic, coriander, egg, salt, and pepper. Form meatballs, brown in pan, simmer in tomato sauce. Serve with cooked basmati rice.

recipes.name: Mastawa-e-Bamia (Okra Rice Soup)
instructions: Brown lamb with onion, add tomato, okra, rice, and water. Simmer until rice and okra are tender.

recipes.name: Narenj Palaw (Orange Rice)
instructions: Cook rice with orange peel, sugar, and cardamom. Layer with cooked lamb, almonds, and pistachios.

recipes.name: Shola-e-Ghorbandi (Herbed Rice and Beans)
instructions: Cook rice and mung beans with herbs and green onion until creamy.

recipes.name: Badenjan-e-Borani (Eggplant Yogurt Dip)
instructions: Roast or fry eggplant, mash and mix with yogurt, garlic, mint, and salt.

recipes.name: Kichiri Shola (Rice and Lentil Porridge)
instructions: Cook rice and lentils with onion, garlic, and spices until creamy.

recipes.name: Kadu Chalaw (Pumpkin Rice)
instructions: Cook rice, saut√© pumpkin with onion, garlic, and spices, mix together.

recipes.name: Nakhod-e-Garm (Afghan Spiced Chickpeas)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add chickpeas and spices, finish with lemon juice.

recipes.name: Shor Nakhod (Chickpea Salad)
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Boulanee Kachaloo (Potato Turnover)
instructions: Make dough, roll out, fill with potato mixture, seal, and fry until golden.

recipes.name: Shola-e-Tarkari (Vegetable Rice Porridge)
instructions: Cook rice and vegetables with spices until creamy.

recipes.name: Kofta Nakhod (Meatballs with Chickpeas)
instructions: Mix beef, onion, garlic, coriander, egg, salt, and pepper. Form meatballs, brown in pan, simmer in tomato sauce with chickpeas.

recipes.name: Sabzi Challow (Spinach Rice)
instructions: Cook rice, saut√© spinach with onion, garlic, and spices, mix together.

recipes.name: Kadu Borani Challow (Pumpkin with Rice)
instructions: Cook rice, saut√© pumpkin with onion, garlic, and spices, mix together.

recipes.name: Narenj Challow (Orange Rice)
instructions: Cook rice with orange peel, sugar, and cardamom. Garnish with almonds and pistachios.

recipes.name: Aush-e-Tarkari (Vegetable Noodle Soup)
instructions: Cook noodles and vegetables with spices until tender.

recipes.name: Banjan-e-Tarkari (Eggplant Vegetable Stew)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add vegetables and spices, simmer until tender.

recipes.name: Korma-e-Tarkari (Vegetable Korma)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add vegetables and spices, simmer until tender.

recipes.name: Kofta Sabzi (Herbed Meatballs)
instructions: Mix beef with herbs, green onion, egg, salt, and pepper. Form meatballs, brown in pan, simmer in tomato sauce.

recipes.name: Sabzi Nakhod (Spinach and Chickpeas)
instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic, add spinach, chickpeas, and spices, simmer until tender.
